title: Topic 08 Question 60
body: You have an on-premises app named App1 that accesses Azure resources by using credentials stored in a configuration file.
You plan to upgrade App1 to use an Azure service principal.
What is required for App1 to programmatically sign in to Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)?
options: the application ID, a client secret, and the object ID
a client secret, the object ID, and the tenant ID
the application ID, a client secret, and the tenant ID
the application ID, a client secret, and the subscription ID
